meanings.definition: To deprive of a right or privilege
meanings.sent1: Being late to the meeting disentitles you from participating in the discussion.
meanings.sent2: Not having a ticket disentitles you from entering the concert.
meanings.sent3: Accidentally leaving your homework at home disentitles you from getting a good grade.
meanings.sent4: Forgetting your password disentitles you from accessing your account.
meanings.sent5: Losing your membership card disentitles you from using the gym facilities.

meanings.sent1: Failing to meet the age requirement disentitles you from entering the contest.
meanings.sent2: Using unauthorized equipment disentitles you from participating in the competition.
meanings.sent3: Wearing mismatched socks disentitles you from winning the fashion show.
meanings.sent4: Not following the rules disentitles you from receiving the award.
meanings.sent5: Ignoring the guidelines disentitles you from joining the team.
